markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sunflower Censer](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1800)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 178</row>

**Price** 480 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn or held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This gold-and-ivory incense burner always emits a pleasant, floral-scented smoke without any need to be refilled. It has a chain that can be easily affixed to a belt or bag, allowing it to be worn without a free hand. As long as the censer is burning, the bearer benefits from the [_undetectable alignment_](/Spells.aspx?ID=348) spell. They also don't appear [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) to [divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47) spells or abilities, or to senses such as [lifesense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=21), unless those abilities successfully [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the censer. The censer can be lit or extinguished with an Interact action.

<document level="2" id="action-1462" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Sunflower Censer

text: <title level="1" right="Item 8" pfs="Standard" > Sunflower Censer Source Impossible Lands pg. 178 Price 480 gp Usage worn or held in 1 hand Bulk L --- This gold-and-ivory incense burner always emits a pleasant, floral-scented smoke without any need to be refilled. It has a chain that can be easily affixed to a belt or bag, allowing it to be worn without a free hand. As long as the censer is burning, the bearer benefits from the undetectable alignment spell. They also don't appear undead to divination spells or abilities, or to senses such as lifesense, unless those abilities successfully counteract the censer. The censer can be lit or extinguished with an Interact action.
